Text: The Plaza Charity GalaThe Downtown Club of Houston Just a friendly reminder that time is running out to sign up for the Downtown Club at Plaza Charity Gala We need your support The Plaza Club Charity Gala Board invites you to Casino Night Benefiting Small Steps Nurturing Center Saturday February Cocktails pm Casino Games pm Complimentary Valet Entertainment provided by Houstons Nightbeat Tickets per person Black Tie RSVP to Lorie Henners Small Steps Nurturing Center Small Steps offers quality programming that is developmentally appropriate for preschool age children giving atrisk children and their parents the opportunity to grow socially emotionally physically intellectually and spiritually You are currently subscribed to members as To unsubscribe send a blank email to
